text: Sighişoara is a city and municipality in Mureş County, Romania. It is on the Târnava Mare River. Sighişoara had a population of 28.102 people as of 2011. == Twin towns == * Dinkelsbühl (Germany) * Kiskunfélegyháza (Hungary) * Baden (Switzerland) * Blois (France) * Città di Castello (Italy) == Other websites == *Town hall of Sighişoara City Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Cities in Mureș County
title: Sighişoara
